thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: LINDA FRONCZAK

author: LINDA FRONCZAK
title: LINDA FRONCZAK
text: First, I will say that the twist futon was everything I wanted it to be. After reading problems about shipping and curb delivery, I thought I made the wrong decision. Luckily, I was one of the lucky ones. My futon was delivered through UPS and I was given 45 minutes notice. It was delivered right to my door on a dolly. It was wrapped in plastic and was perfect. All I had to do was screw on legs. I tried to get free shipping since the order was over $500, but I was told that was only in New York. I also asked about an ad I saw about 25% off, and I was told that was a mistake and it was $25 off but not on anything that was already marked down. I was ready to cancel but it was too late. All in all, it was a good purchase.
